235- B 081273— 353 (2018/03)
D 1 -

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
  fuu .eiÜ m;%h www. documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2018 uehs ui 11 jeks Èk m< lrk .eiÜ 
m;%fha oekaùï 2018 wfm%a,a ui 27 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh  
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜

ie' hq'-  2018'04'12 Èk m< jQ wxl 2"067 ork .eiÜ m;%fha  III iy IV ^w& fldgia m< fkdùh'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'04'20236  
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - kqf.af.dv
fkdjákd kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj wjika lrk ,o j¾I 05lg jvd mer‚ my; wxl i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2018'07'20 Èfkka miq  
fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQÞkï lr we;'
   02' fuu kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjhla ;udg wjYH iïmQ¾K iy;sl msgm;la fyda tys hï fldgila ,nd .ekSug 
wjYH kï tA i|yd 2018'07'20 Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj; b,a,Sï l< hq;= h'
   03' ;j o" tlS Èfkka miq kvq jd¾;d úkdY lrkq ,nk neúka tA iïnkaOj miqj flfrk b,a,Sï fkdi,ld yßk 
nj ;jÿrg;a okajñ'
 jhs' wd¾' î' fk¨kafoksh"

Y%S ,xld rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ uqøKh lrk ,§' 
úúO oekaùï
ixfYdaOkh
2016'11'04 Èk m< lrk ,o wxl 1992 ork .eiÜ m;%fha ksfõok wxl 11-320 my; mßÈ ixfYdaOkh úh hq;= h (-
ffY,S wOHdmksl moku ixia:d.; lsÍu i`oyd jQ mk;ls
wdpd¾h chïm;s úl%ur;ak jk uu Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha md¾,sfïka;=fõ wxl 48 ^1& ork ia:djr 
ksfhda.h hgf;a —ffY,S wOHdmksl moku ixia:d.; lsÍu i`oyd jQ mk;ls˜ hkqfjka ye`Èkafjk mk; flgqïm;la 
md¾,sfïka;=fõ § bÈßm;a lsÍug woyia lrk nj fuhska oekqï foñ'
   mk;a flgqïmf;a wruqKq jkqfha my; i`oyka fmdÿ mrud¾:j,ska hqla; jkakd jQ tlS moku ixia:d.; lsÍuhs (-
 
^w& wOHdmksl ks¾udKYS,S l%shdldrlï" jD;a;Sh l%shdldrlï iy ld¾hidOk l%shdldrlï wdrïN lsÍu ;
 ^wd& ;ukaf.a ixialD;sl Wreuh yd wkkH;dj ms<sn`o ;Dma;su;a yd tajd ms<sn`o oekqu we;s iunr mqoa.,hska ùu 
msKsi orejka yd ;reKhska mqyqKq lsÍu ; iy
 ^we& orejkaf.a" ;reK ;eke;a;kaf.a yd úfYaI wjYH;d iys; ;eke;a;kaf.a oekqu j¾Okh lsÍu ;
hkdÈh fõ' 
 wdpd¾h chïm;s úl%ur;ak"
 md¾,sfïka;= uka;%S'
04-666
